README for task3¶

Description¶

This function that takes two inputs:
a dataset represented as a numpy-array, and an “axis” argument. The function computes mean and standard deviation of a dataset along the specified “axis”, which can be 0, 1, or None Mean and standard deviation are returned.

Examples¶

  • Mean and Standard Deviation of Matrix Columns
M, S = task3(A, axis=0)

  • Mean and Standard Deviation of Matrix Rows
M, S = task3(A, axis=1)

  • Mean and Standard Deviation of Flattened Matrix
M, S = task3(A, axis=None)
